dfm.disk.hidden.name: 磁盘隐藏
dfm.disk.hidden.description[zh_CN]: 该配置项用于配置磁盘隐藏。该数组中包含了需要隐藏的磁盘的UUID。
dfm.disk.hidden.description: This configuration item is used to configure disk hiding,this array contains the UUID of the disk that you want to hide.

bookmark.name: 书签
bookmark.description[zh_CN]: 此配置项将需要显示的书签对象存储在数组中。
bookmark.description: This configuration item stores in an array the bookmark objects that need to be displayed by default.

dfd.menu.action.hidden.name: 文件对话框菜单项隐藏
dfd.menu.action.hidden.name[zh_CN]: 文件对话框菜单项隐藏
dfd.menu.action.hidden.description: 隐藏文件对话框指定菜单项
dfd.menu.action.hidden.description[zh_CN]: 隐藏文件对话框指定菜单项

dfm.menu.protocoldev.enable.name: Enable protocol devices to display extension menu
dfm.menu.protocoldev.enable.name[zh_CN]: 启用网络协议设备显示右键扩展菜单
dfm.menu.protocoldev.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否启用网络协议设备显示右键扩展菜单
dfm.menu.protocoldev.enable.description: It's used to control whether to enable protocol devices to display extension menu is enabled

dfm.menu.blockdev.enable.name: Enable removable block devices to display extension menu
dfm.menu.blockdev.enable.name[zh_CN]: 启用可移动块设备显示右键扩展菜单
dfm.menu.blockdev.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否启用块设备显示右键扩展菜单
dfm.menu.blockdev.enable.description: It's used to control whether to enable block devices to display extension menu is enabled

dfm.vault.algo.name.name: 保险箱加密算法
dfm.vault.algo.name.description: 保险箱加密算法，默认为国密算法(sm4-128-ecb),可选国际算法(aes-256-gcm)
dfm.vault.algo.name.description[zh_CN]: 保险箱加密算法，默认为国密算法(sm4-128-ecb),可选国际算法(aes-256-gcm)

dfm.samba.permanent.name: Samba共享端常驻显示挂载入口
dfm.samba.permanent.name[zh_CN]: Samba共享端常驻显示挂载入口
dfm.samba.permanent.description[zh_CN]: 该配置项用于控制是否常驻显示Samba的挂在入口，即便其没有挂载
dfm.samba.permanent.description: 该配置项用于控制是否常驻显示Samba的挂载入口，即便其没有挂载

dfm.mount.dlnfs.name: Extend filename charactors
dfm.mount.dlnfs.description[zh_CN]: 扩展文件名字符数需重启后才能生效
dfm.mount.dlnfs.description: 扩展文件名字符数需重启后才能生效

dfm.mount.dlnfs.defaults.name: Dirs which should enable extend filename
dfm.mount.dlnfs.defaults.name[zh_CN]: 启用长文件名扩展的目录

dfm.mount.dlnfs.defaults.description: 默认启用长文件名扩展的目录

dfm.trash.allfiletotrash.name: Normal deletion of files under peripheral and network paths enters the recycle bin

dd.disabled.name: Disabled Desktop
dd.disabled.description[zh_CN]: 如果值为true，DDE桌面将不加载任何插件，无桌面窗口。
dd.disabled.description: If the value is set to true, the DDE Desktop will not load any plugins and no desktop window.
